descriptionHtml:
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=4][b][i]Mystic Gloves Redone v1.0

Spiritual successor to Mystic Gloves by Volek


"Mystic Gloves are based on the Focusing/Mystic Tuning Gloves. Original design and 3 recolors included. All gloves are enchantable and compatible with the Mage Armor perk
You can buy the gloves from Drevis Neloren at the College of Winterhold, he's usually walking around the college exteriors or inside the Hall of Countenance."

Installation:
Extract the Data folder from the zip file to your Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim\ folder
or use NMM or Mod Organizer

Load order:
Use BOSS or Loot

Version History:
1.0 - Re-release of the original mod by Volek. Due to the fact that Volek made this mod prior to release of the Creation Kit it has messed-up sub records and unused keywords I restructured it with CK just to be sure.

All credits goes to Volek.[/i][/b][/size][/font]
author: deynger
